name: 2018/11/08 Dinner Salad
description: Delight in the fresh, high-fiber essence of our 2018/11/08 Dinner Salad. A harmonious blend of raw cabbage and carrots, seasoned with a twist of salt, pepper, and a hint of coco sugar. Infused with the creamy richness of Greek yogurt and the pungent kick of raw garlic, this salad is a testament to healthy, yet scrumptious dining. Perfect for anyone on a quest for Healthy Recipes that do not compromise on flavor, this Healthified salad will invigorate your meal with its nutritious goodness.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the cabbage and carrots thoroughly under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the cabbage and grate the carrots, then combine in a large salad bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together Greek yogurt, minced garlic, coco sugar, salt, and pepper until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the yogurt dressing over the cabbage and carrot mixture. Toss until all ingredients are well coated with the dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
